text:
Special camp for registering the biometric details for the issue of Aadhaar Card will be held at the following places till January 20: Collector’s office premises, taluk offices in Karaikal and Tirunallar, village panchayat office in Polagam, Common Service Centres at Ammalchathiram, Thennakudi, Chinnakannu Chetty Street, and Kottucherry. In a release here on Tuesday, E. Vallavan, District Collector, said those who had not registered the details, can utilise the special camps during working hours.

Flood relief for

ration cardholders

The district administration has released the names of the ration cardholders who have not yet received the flood relief of Rs. 4,000. The list has been displayed at the respective fair price shops. In a release here on Tuesday, E. Vallavan, District Collector, has advised them to get the relief on or before January 10.
title: Special camp for Aadhaar cards
